items.content_html: CurlDock: A lightweight, developer-friendly tool for API testing and curl script management. Built with Rust and React, it simplifies the creation, execution, and organization of curl commands through a user-friendly interface. Designed for local development environments, CurlDock emphasizes simplicity and integration with existing workflows.

items.content_html: Open-source TypeScript / JavaScript project currently named 11dotjs (pronounced like "eleven.js"). 11dotjs is not a framework, and not an API. Its only dependency is HTML5. 11dotjs has two goals. (1) Share free, lightweight, ready-to-use web components with the masses; (2) Share a new web-authoring model that replaces HTML with JSON.
items.title: elisokal/11dotjs: Open-source TypeScript / JavaScript project currently named 11dotjs (pronounced like "eleven.js"). 11dotjs is not a framework, and not an API.
